text:
League 1
PSG: Herrera unavailable against Brest
The wounds punctuate for many weeks the life of the PSG. Saturday at 17:30, the Parisians will go to Brest. Ander Herrera is out and Icardi is uncertain.
07 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Mourad Bennis



Dijon - PSG: the notes of the Parisian playersAfter the meeting of this Friday evening against Dijon, discover the notes of the Parisian players.Icon Sport



Keylor Navas 3 / 10Icon Sport



Juan Bernat 4 / 10Icon Sport



Presnel Kimpembe 3 / 10Icon Sport



Abdou Diallo: 3 / 10Icon Sport



Colin Dagba 3.5 / 10Icon Sport



Marquinhos: 5 / 10Icon Sport



Idrissa Gueye 4,5 / 10Icon Sport



Leandro Paredes: 3 / 10Icon Sport



Kyllian MbappÃ©7 / 10Icon Sport



Mauro Icardi: 4 / 10Icon Sport



Angel Di Maria: 5 / 10Icon Sport

Dijon - PSG: the notes of the Parisian players!




The weeks follow each other and are similar for the PSG. Via a statement from the club, we learn that Anderson Herrera will not participate in Saturday's game in Brest. Mauro Icardi, scorer yesterday against Brugge but out after a discomfort in his left foot, could also miss the call.




Another injury for a Parisian




Ander Herrera + 12 ðŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Following its victory in the Champions League against Club Brugge (1-0), Paris Saint-Germain has reviewed the physical condition of its troops in preparation for the championship match scheduled this Saturday at 17:30 against Stade Brest.
A meeting that will not dispute Ander Herrera. Spanish is indeed forfeit due to a quadriceps problem. Mauro Icardi, limping out last night, is uncertain. The Argentinian would suffer from a contusion of the left foot.
